title: Cosmic Reaver Kassadin Charitable Donation - Final Update

replies.body:
This is so nice.

I find this neat too: I look at the Cosmic Reaver Kass splash and think 'This fictional character made/will-help-make a bigger difference in peoples lives, than so many real life characters/people have or will.' 

And most of them wont even know his name. He's a little like a superhero. 

I hope theres at least a picture of him at the centres (or wherever), tbh if i was a kid suffering from cancer, id kinda like to see the face of my superhero. That stuff means a lot to kids. (and probably adults too) 

Well done RIOT, well done.

Hi.

I think this is something amazing, Proud too be a part of the League community.
It just goes too show that Company's like Riot are not in it for the money, They actually want positive outcomes!
Good Stuff Guys!

-RedPandaFox
So any actual details on say, the donation amount for each one?

Hey! We knew this question would come up, but we can’t talk about specific numbers for charitable donations. I know that sucks, but it’s our policy to keep these confidential. I can guarantee that we donated 100% of the proceeds from the above time period. We’re really happy with the number - it’s going to help a lot of people.

>but it’s our policy to keep these confidential.

Why?
Money is just a serious thing, Good work Riot. Keep it up <3
Sounds great. Fantastic decision. Glad a lot of thought was put into it :-).
